titles.title: Teach Me To Pray Lord (nice easy)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Living in Thee Lord And Thou in me Constant abiding this is my plea Grant me Thy power Boundless and free Power with men and power with Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Teach me to pray Lord teach me to pray This is my heart cry day unto day I long to know Thy will And Thy way Teach me to pray Lord teach me to pray{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Power in prayer Lord power in prayer Here 'mid earth's sin And sorrow and care Men lost and dying Souls in despair O give me power Power in prayer{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My weakened will Lord Thou canst renew My sinful nature Thou canst subdue Fill me just now with power anew Power to pray and power to do{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Teach me to pray Lord teach me to pray Thou art my Pattern day unto day Thou art my Surety Now and for aye Teach me to pray Lord teach me to pray{/lang-eng}
